alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 2:14PM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph, reducing visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country will be impacted by heavy accumulating snow. Travel could be very difficult to impossible over Highway 14. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
